text: The Central and South Asian Football Federation (CASAFF) is a sub-grouping of the Asian Football Confederation. It consists of 12 countries divided into two groups: the South Asian Football Federation (SAFF, eight countries) and the Central Asian Football Federation (CAFF, four countries). This confederation is the least successful of the four sub-federations of the Asian Football Confederation. == Members == === SAFF === * * * * * * * * === CAFF === * * * * Category:Football organizations Category:Sport in Asia
title: Central and South Asian Football Federation
